name: Autopilot Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Autopilot Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Autopilot API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Autopilot API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many lists

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address of the contact | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: autopilotList (值: None) - List to which this contact will be added on creation. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
newEmail (值: None) - If provided, will change the email address of the contact identified by the Email field

notify (值: None) - By default Autopilot notifies registered REST hook endpoints for contact_added/contact_updated events when a new contact is added or an existing contact is updated via API. Disable to skip notifications.
autopilotSessionId (值: None) - Used to associate a contact with a session
unsubscribed (值: None) - Whether to subscribe or un-subscribe a contact

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: Can be ID or email | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

triggerId.name: triggerId
triggerId.description: List ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
triggerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger Name or ID | 作用: List ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.description: ID of the list to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: ID of the list to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the list to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the list to create | (必填项)
